text: Jab hum ney tum say wada liya aur tum per toor ko khara ker diya (aur keh diya) kay humari di hui cheez ko mazboot thaamo aur suno! To enhon ney kaha hum ney suna aur na famani ki aur inn kay dilon mein bachray ki mohabbat (goya) pila di gaee ba sabab inn kay kufur kay. Inn say keh dijiye kay tumhara eman tumhen bura hukum dey raha hai agar tum momin ho
